page.title: 18AT SCHOOL IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: {Maths.}At school we do maths.We do addition,subtraction,multiplication and division sums.The Fourth Years do long division which is harder. {English.}In English we have to answer questions with correct spelling and we have to put the full stops in. {P.E.}In P.E. we climb ropes,have races,throw and catch balls and do cartwheels and forward rolls. {Nature.}In this we look at flowers and insects and read about animals. {Geography.}In this we learn about our country and other countries of the world. {Stories.}We write stories.We make them up and write them down in a book. {Music.}In this we sing from pamphlets and play instruments to go with it. Also we write about instruments and the sort of music we enjoy. {Reading.}We read a book every day.
